title: SUNNY SUBLET:PLEASANT AND SPACIOUS  WITH LOVELY VIEW
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


PLEASANT SUNNY ONE BEDROOM  APARTMENT SUBLET IN PARIS
AMAZING VIEW OVER PARIS 
***********
Available in April
for several months  
995 EUROS PLUS UTILITIES
weekly and daily rate available**
Security deposit  refundable at the end*
I shall be travelling and wish to sublet my apt for the duration
of my travels*
SHORT TERM OR LONG TERM SUBLET
DAILY Rate available
as well as monthly or weekly
Flexibility in date availability
Centrally Located sunny and spacious apartment available now in an artsy-bohemian area that is safe , with lots of interesting galleries and cafes, plenty of green spaces nearby with beautiful leafy ancient trees, 
near to parks, markets and public libraries and recreation centres.
Neighbourhood is wonderful for strolling day or evening (very safe and well-lit streets: 
Many french & ethnic cafes+ restaurants with 2 weekly colourful-ethnic markets  5 minutes nearby/
neighbouring bookstores and /artist spaces & alternative galleries **
Wonderful Atmosphere that is Spacious & very bright, sunny 27 M2/ 290.60 square feet
wifi internet connection available
10th floor view over uncluttered skyline
*3 Floor to Ceiling Large Windows with Veranda 
*Superb View over Paris great for artists/painters. 
The Bastille, Panteon, Monparnasse Tower; other monuments seen from my terrace
Very Suitable Space to receive family/friends as visitors :
Black leather Couch opens into convertible bed fitting 2 persons 
**Cupboard with stow-away pull-out Single Bed
MAIN SLEEPING AREA HAS :
*Another Bed which is  queen-sized similar to futon for 2 persons (all bedding/towels provided) 
*Wooden Book shelves 
*Large White wooden writing table with two chairs 
***Beautiful Greenspace with Several Large plants and other smaller plants 
* Fully Equipped Kitchen is separate from living space (with door) 
All dishes, pots & pans and utensils supplied 
**Pretty Separate Bathroom w. large bathtub,sink, toilet & bidet/
*Central Paris 11th District/Metro Parmentier (line 3) 
* 5 minute walk to green spaces (parc belleville, buttes-chaumont) 
**Pleasant 5-10 min.stroll to: Canal St. Martin/Marais/Bastille
** I am looking for someone who is a quiet,responsable individual 
with a healthy lifestyle /who enjoys plants (GREEN THUMB) *
** whom I could meet in Paris to determine studio sublet suitability-compatability
this is a smoke-free space.   *
Immediate viewing possible
*** Please email me a detailed introduction about yourself :
What brings you to paris ?
Interests/Leisure activities ?
your dates required for sublet ? 
arrival & departure dates
**Thank you  for your Interest**
